title: Terreldor: The Long Path Home
description: The Kingdom of Terreldor is torn by war. Mark is presented with a miraculous opportunity to guide its people toward peace, but believes it's beyond his ability. If he can conquer his doubts and fear, he will learn even a raindrop can turn the tide. Mark and his brother are unlikely visitors in Terreldor, ever in search of a way home. The course they choose will shape not only the world they leave behind, but also their destiny, and the men they will become. Experience the culmination of their adventure in Terreldor: The Long Path Home. Embark today at www.Terreldor.com
author: Chris M. Hibbard
